name: TURN ON YOU LIGHT
description:
Turn on you light!

When we feel bad and there is darkness around, there is nothing better than time with a friend. Turn on you light!

The game tries to show how much friends are needed in difficult situations. Interaction between each other, sacrifice and fun.

Controlls:

- If you hold down the right mouse button, the camera will move.

- The camera can be zoomed out with the mouse wheel.

- SPACEBAR will return camera to the fire and reset zoom.

- Clicking on a spirit will reset its current action, but they don't like that.

- You can drop an item from a spirit by clicking on it.

- Use COMBO time to ignore penalty items

- Items from the quest list will add 2 times more burning.

- If you bring an empty tree into the fire, a create new spirit.

by G_SHOLAR, Little Princesse
